function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Non-compliance with lockdown measures","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of ai for enforcing social distancing and lockdown measures","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ai systems assuming all contingencies are the same as those in the training dataset, leading to inaccurate decision-making","category":"Tools&Apps","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Dependence of ai on human knowledge and expertise for effective implementation in pandemic management","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential dissemination of bogus data and fraudulent information related to covid-19 testing and reporting.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Incentivizing volunteer participation using blockchain technology","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of awareness about blockchain and its potential","category":"Education","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Integration of blockchain applications with legacy systems","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk of infection through face-to-face contact during delivery of diagnosis letter","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Wearable sensor technology may provide a false sense of security, leading to decreased vigilance in following other necessary precautions.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Continuous and remote monitoring of bp is essential for covid-19-positive patients to prevent sudden events and reduce cross-contamination.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Aggregate data from wearables contributing to improved public health responses.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of ai and deep learning for covid-19 diagnosis and prevention.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Forecasting pandemic spread using ai and data analysis.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Application of ai in medical research and social context during pandemic","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Machine learning prediction of infection and severity risk for covid-19","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on ai for outcome prediction","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependence on remote monitoring and data transmission","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of efficient data and application accessibility for healthcare management","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Relying on incomplete symptom screening for covid-19","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of effective contact tracing","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of empirical studies evaluating the effectiveness of digital contact tracing","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inaccurate tools for contact tracing and social distancing","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rise in e-learning and use of iot in smart learning increases the risk of cyber attacks and data breaches.","category":"Education","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Barriers to innovation due to regulatory procedures","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Legal, regulatory, and policy challenges","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of adoption of available technology in health systems","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Mixed evidence and ongoing debate about the relationship between temperature and the spread of covid-19.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Influence of environmental factors such as temperature, humidity, and UV radiation on virus survivability and transmission rates.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Differences in the transmission potential of SARS-CoV-2 within a country due to vehicle concentration and urbanization","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential misinformation on covid-19 transmission and risk factors related to climate and geography","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unsubstantiated conclusions on the impact of heat and sunlight on SARS-CoV-2 transmission","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Relying on seasonal variations to contain SARS-CoV-2 spread","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Analysis based on covid-19 cases per million inhabitants and country’s latitude could lead to oversimplified conclusions about disease propagation","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inability to control for differential testing intensity may skew the analysis of disease propagation","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reporting biases and incomplete coverage of testing approaches","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Factors such as health infrastructure, socioeconomic background, and health supplies affecting the spread of covid-19","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inability to assess seasonal patterns and mutated versions of SARS-CoV-2","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Positive association between latitude and number of covid-19 cases","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increase in covid-19 cases per million inhabitants with increase in absolute latitude","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Possible boost in covid-19 impact due to increasing temperatures and longer sunlight exposure during summer","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate testing intensity can lead to underreporting of covid-19 cases","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential increase in social interactions due to higher temperatures may lead to greater transmission of contagious diseases.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Significant drops in energy and electricity demand due to pandemic-related closures","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increase in household energy consumption","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of willingness to pay for hems leading to slower market growth","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Collection of internet-based survey data with potential for biased responses due to self-selection","category":"Data in/out","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on self-reported data for perceived risk of covid-19 infection and energy usage","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Content downloaded from unverified source","category":"Security","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unverified terms and conditions","category":"Security","confidence":"High"}]}
